pages.text: Rui's Pantry provides different types of all materials, but for this guide, we'll use Formas variants, because I think it is the better :)
With the wood variations you can craft pretty much everything you craft with normal vanilla woods. We have some examples after this page.
Because of this being a non-finished build, the trapdoor and door crafts are designed to return oak variants.

pages.title: Tool Sets
pages.text: You can also build yourself basic wooden and stone tools to start your survival journey! This includes fishing rod and bow.$(br2)$(bold)$(l:ores/ores)Next Entry (Ores)$()
